docs.lead_paragraph: Jordan executed 15 people on Saturday, including 10 convicted on terrorism charges ranging from an attack a decade ago on Western tourists to the slaying of a writer in the largest mass execution in the country's recent history.

headline.print_headline: Jordan Says Executes 15, With 10 for Terrorism Convictions
headline.main: Jordan Says Executes 15, With 10 for Terrorism Convictions

docs.snippet: Jordan executed 15 people on Saturday, including 10 convicted on terrorism charges ranging from an attack a decade ago on Western tourists to the slaying of a writer in the largest mass execution in the country's recent history....

docs.lead_paragraph: Jordan on Saturday executed 10 prisoners with ties to Islamic extremism who carried out five shootings and a bombing since 2003, the government spokesman said. It was the largest round of executions in the kingdom in at least a decade.

headline.print_headline: Jordan Hangs 10 for Attacks Linked to Islamic Extremism
headline.main: Jordan Hangs 10 for Attacks Linked to Islamic Extremism

docs.snippet: Jordan on Saturday executed 10 prisoners with ties to Islamic extremism who carried out five shootings and a bombing since 2003, the government spokesman said. It was the largest round of executions in the kingdom in at least a decade....

docs.lead_paragraph: Sabrina Ionescu hit two free throws with 6.4 seconds left to give Oregon a 70-69 upset victory over 11th-ranked Washington in a Pac-12 Conference Tournament quarterfinal on Friday night.

headline.print_headline: Ionescu's FTs Lift Oregon Women Past No. 11 Washington 70-69
headline.main: Ionescu's FTs Lift Oregon Women Past No. 11 Washington 70-69

docs.snippet: Sabrina Ionescu hit two free throws with 6.4 seconds left to give Oregon a 70-69 upset victory over 11th-ranked Washington in a Pac-12 Conference Tournament quarterfinal on Friday night....

docs.lead_paragraph: Loko Kalicha Junno says she trekked for a week to save her 10 cattle from dying of thirst and hunger. But none survived. Now, at one of the last watering holes in this remote village, she fears for herself.

headline.print_headline: Desperate Herders Lose Animals, Hope Amid Drought in Kenya
headline.main: Desperate Herders Lose Animals, Hope Amid Drought in Kenya

docs.snippet: Loko Kalicha Junno says she trekked for a week to save her 10 cattle from dying of thirst and hunger. But none survived. Now, at one of the last watering holes in this remote village, she fears for herself....

docs.lead_paragraph: Off-spinner Nathan Lyon claimed career-best figures of eight for 50 to help Australia bundle out India for 189 on the first day of the second test at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Lyon Floors India With Eight-Wicket Haul
headline.main: Lyon Floors India With Eight-Wicket Haul

docs.lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal continues to show no rust in his first tournament since losing the Australian Open final earlier this year.
docs.snippet: Rafael Nadal continues to show no rust in his first tournament since losing the Australian Open final earlier this year....

docs.lead_paragraph: At least eight Afghan civilians, including four children, were killed in an attack late Friday night in western Farah province, according to Afghan officials. However there is disagreement over what exactly caused the deaths.

headline.print_headline: 8 Civilians Killed in Afghanistan by Alleged Air Strike
headline.main: 8 Civilians Killed in Afghanistan by Alleged Air Strike

docs.snippet: At least eight Afghan civilians, including four children, were killed in an attack late Friday night in western Farah province, according to Afghan officials. However there is disagreement over what exactly caused the deaths....

docs.lead_paragraph: A California school district will no longer take part in funeral processions for sailors and Navy SEALS killed overseas that have drawn thousands of students.

headline.main: School District: No More Part in US Navy Funeral Processions

docs.snippet: A California school district will no longer take part in funeral processions for sailors and Navy SEALS killed overseas that have drawn thousands of students....

docs.lead_paragraph: Fresh from her best supporting actress Oscar win for her role in "Fences," Viola Davis is at Harvard University to receive the 2017 Artist of the Year Award from the Harvard Foundation.
